Lag means delay between a user‚Äôs action and the system‚Äôs response. It occurs mostly due to slow internet, high ping, overloaded devices, or server congestion. Common in online gaming, video calls, and streaming, lag can affect performance and cause frustration. To reduce it, keep devices updated, close background apps, and use a strong internet connection. I don't really mind the ads, even if there's 5 or more, as long as the show/movie is watchable. But it's not for my Android TV. when I'm on the home page, most of the shows that are recommended are grey and don't show the title no matter how much I restart the app or my internet. But when I do find something to watch, after some ads or in the middle of one, it freezes the screen and words pop up like, "Oops! something happened. Error:4003." So then I can't watch it at all because it continues doing this for every show I pick. And when I exit, it doesn't save my progress so then I have to skip through it. The app is good and it works perfectly on my other devices though.
